title: Russia’s Lavrov Says NATO Is Using Ukraine as a Proxy, Warns Against World War III
content:
1. Russia’s Lavrov Says NATO Is Using Ukraine as a Proxy, Warns Against World War III  The Wall Street Journal
  2. The threat of nuclear war is real, top Russian official says; UN chief travels to Moscow to meet with Putin  CNBC
  3. Top Russian diplomat warns Ukraine against provoking World War III  WCNC
  4. Attacks Begin in New Country as Russia Warns Nuclear Threat Is 'Real'  The Daily Beast
  5. Russia warns Ukraine conflict could lead to World War Three - BBC News  BBC News
contentSnippet:
Russia’s Lavrov Says NATO Is Using Ukraine as a Proxy, Warns Against World War III  The Wall Street Journal
The threat of nuclear war is real, top Russian official says; UN chief travels to Moscow to meet with Putin  CNBC
Top Russian diplomat warns Ukraine against provoking World War III  WCNC
Attacks Begin in New Country as Russia Warns Nuclear Threat Is 'Real'  The Daily Beast
Russia warns Ukraine conflict could lead to World War Three - BBC News  BBC News

localize.title: ロシアのラブロフ大統領、NATOはウクライナを代理として利用していると述べ、第三次世界大戦に警鐘を鳴らす
